pages.text: This modpack contains some custom structures in order to make some mobs available in the betweenlands.$(br2)All normal Vampirism structures will spawn as usual.

pages.text: You may find a caged villager somewhere...

pages.text: Vampire Barons can be found in underground dungeons.
